title: Main Facebook page not loading properly, but login page works and it does work in incognito mode.
content: Hi, upon waking up this morning, found out my facebook is not loading properly. Did try clearing the cache and still issue persist. The login page works fine, but when logged in, its just plain blank. Did try logging in on incognito mode and it works as it should be. Can anyone help?
creator: verserkis

title: Custom Protocol
content: Hi I have an web application which will open a windows application using the custom protocol. I need to open the application directly with out any user action, in chrome I was able to do by using the URLWhiteList and in edge using the URLAllowList, how to handle the same in firefox.
creator: krothapallitrilok

title: Password recovery
content: My wife recently imported logins/passwords from chrome and that over wrote the values that would be more current. Is there anyway to revert it back to the previous state before the import?
creator: eddison.torres

title: Firefox constantly crashing over last couple of months
content: HI. Firefox has been regularly crashing over the last month or two. Today it's crashed 4-5 times in 10 minutes. I tried sfc /scannow just now and there were no integrity violations. I've always submitted the crash report immediately after each event, however the last few were unsubmitted when I checked the log just now, so I've submitted them too. Firefox has always been updated to the latest version. Any ideas? Cheers Ian
creator: zobrdrool

title: Security breach
content:
I have a couple of problems

1) I just did a security firefox security scan an was informed that in 2017 there was a breach of my "My Heritage Account" and that passwords and Email addresses were compromised. I would like more info on this reportÂ : just what passwords and Email addresses were compromised? Was it just My Heritage data or would it be everything on my computer.


2) My Firefox software won't open my Outlook emails: Edge and Google Chrome work fine. What is the fix for this problem?
creator: kmasters1212
